title: Poster, "Solo Exhibition, New Type", 2014
provenance: Saori Shiro Shita new to Cooper Hewitt, August 2014
description: Poster advertising solo exhibition by the designer. Surreal line drawings of nude figures, animals, clouds, intestines, an eyeball, and other unidentifiable images are printed in black and white, with sections of red and blue, against lavender ground. Atop this composition, large Japanese text is printed vertically, in light brown.
justification: For her solo exhibition “New Type” Shiro Shita Saori illustrated a dense, chaotic assemblage of graphic elements which form the backdrop for her vertically oriented text promoting the exhibition.&nbsp; The poster was the winner of the 2014 exhibition/contest 100 Best Posters of Germany, Austria and Switzerland.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Solo Exhibition, New Type", 2014. Digital print on paper. Gift of Shiro Shita Saori. 2014-35-2.
